question: Who can Max speak to at the Blackwell Swimming Pool?
What optional photo can Max take at the pool?

choices.B: A photo of the wasted girl
choices.C: A photo of the energy drinks
choices.D: A photo of the double moon

question: Who does Max persuade to attend the party at the pool?
What does Max say about the oxygen kit at the VIP section?

choices.A: "That oxygen kit might come in handy if somebody binges."
choices.B: "Chips and crackers... spare no expense, Vortex Club."
choices.C: "So the Vortex VIPs get real alcohol at their underage bar... again."
choices.D: "Oh, that makes me want to pull a 'Carrie' on the Vortex Club..."
